value.title: The new Power BI App Workspace experience
value.excerpt: The new Power BI App Workspace experience GA'd in April of 2019. Adam takes you through what the new Power BI App Workspace is all about and what is coming down the road.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba

value.title: What the heck is USERPRINCIPALNAME in Power BI? (Row-Level Security)
value.excerpt: Ever wonder what USERPRINCIPALNAME is in DAX within Power BI? Or the difference between USERPRINCIPALNAME and USERNAME? Hint - It's used with Row-Level Security.  New Row-Level Security course from Guy in a Cube - https://guyinacu.be/courses  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: YES!!! BLOCK Classic Workspaces in Power BI. Even from Microsoft Teams!
value.excerpt: The ability to BLOCK classic workspaces from being created in Power BI is finally here! Adam shows you how to implement and what to consider. Create Microsoft Teams without the worry! value.title: Power BI Drill Through: 5 Different Alternatives That May be Better For You!
value.excerpt: Power BI Drill Through isn’t always the best option to show more detail. There are alternatives that may work better for you. We cover the top 5:  1️⃣ Cross Filter 2️⃣️ Tooltips & Report Page Tooltips 3️⃣ Dynamic Link to External Report 4️⃣ Dynamic Link to Power BI Report 5️⃣️ Using Bookmarks 👉 Catch

value.title: PowerBI.tips - PUG - External Tools & Business Ops
value.excerpt: This month Mike and Seth go through the external tools functionality of Power BI desktop.  Additionally, we are introduced to the Amazing Business Ops tool which helps users add External tools into Power BI desktop.   Download Business Ops: https://powerbi.tips/product/business-ops-beta/

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - ALM ToolKit with Christian Wade
value.excerpt: The ALM Toolkit is an excellent tool for aiding users with Tabular Model management.  Christian Wade has been generous enough to provide us with a detailed tutorial on the ALM ToolKit.    ALM Toolkit provides the following features: - Database Compare - Code Merging - Easy Deployments - Source-Control

value.title: Combining Tables in Power BI   Union Except and Intersect in DAX
value.excerpt: Power Query is often the engine used for combining data tables, especially using Merge or Append. However, sometimes, you might need to do that operation in DAX. An example of that is when you want to create that combination only virtually as part of a measure calculation that evaluates dynamically.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/IPziqmQgJFw" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Create Ribbon Chart Using Charticulator inside Power BI
value.excerpt: This short video shows how to create your own Ribbon Chart inside Charticulator and then import it into Power BI desktop to access the data source website see the below link: https://gs.statcounter.com/os-market-share/mobile/worldwide  also, the transformed dataset has been uploaded here: https://radacad-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/p/leila/EWvPqySqTIhNs-fR1bp7JJYB-pQLMtphhuZ_aE5jLcHQ1w?e=135oPD
